channel.title: 9-day Weather Forecast

item.title: Bulletin updated at 16:30 HKT 05/Feb/2018
item.author: Hong Kong Observatory
item.description:
General Situation:
The winter monsoon over southern China will persist in the next couple of days. It will be cold, mainly fine and dry over the region. A relatively warm and humid easterly airstream is expected to bring cloudy weather with some rain to the coast of Guangdong in the latter part of this week. A replenishment of the winter monsoon will affect southern China early next week.

Date/Month: 06/02 (Tuesday)
Wind: Northeast force 4.
Weather: Mainly fine. It will be cold. Very dry during the day.
Temp range: 8 - 13 C
R.H. range: 35 - 60 per Cent

Date/Month: 07/02 (Wednesday)
Wind: East to northeast force 4.
Weather: Mainly fine and dry. Cold in the morning.
Temp range: 10 - 15 C
R.H. range: 45 - 70 per Cent

Date/Month: 08/02 (Thursday)
Wind: East to northeast force 4 to 5.
Weather: Sunny periods. Cold in the morning. One or two light rain patches at night.
Temp range: 12 - 16 C
R.H. range: 50 - 85 per Cent

Date/Month: 09/02 (Friday)
Wind: East to northeast force 4, force 5 at first.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with one or two light rain patches.
Temp range: 14 - 17 C
R.H. range: 75 - 90 per Cent

Date/Month: 10/02 (Saturday)
Wind: Northeast force 3.
Weather: Bright periods. Visibility relatively low in some areas.
Temp range: 15 - 19 C
R.H. range: 70 - 90 per Cent

Date/Month: 11/02 (Sunday)
Wind: North force 5, occasionally force 6 offshore.
Weather: Dry with sunny intervals. Rather cool in the morning and at night.
Temp range: 13 - 16 C
R.H. range: 50 - 75 per Cent

Date/Month: 12/02 (Monday)
Wind: Northeast force 4, becoming east force 5 later.
Weather: Fine and dry. Cold in the morning.
Temp range: 12 - 16 C
R.H. range: 40 - 65 per Cent

Date/Month: 13/02 (Tuesday)
Wind: East force 4, occasionally force 5.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with sunny intervals. Rather cool in the morning.
Temp range: 13 - 17 C
R.H. range: 60 - 80 per Cent

Date/Month: 14/02 (Wednesday)
Wind: East force 3 to 4.
Weather: Cloudy. Coastal mist patches.
Temp range: 15 - 18 C
R.H. range: 70 - 90 per Cent

Sea surface temperature at 2 P.M. 05/02/2018 at North Point was 15 degrees C.
Soil temperatures at 7 A.M. 05/02/2018 at Hong Kong Observatory :
0.5 M below surface was 17.0 degrees C
1.0 M below surface was 20.3 degrees C
